title: Tibits â€“ Gurtengasse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European
description: Another branch of Tibits self-serve vegetarian buffet. Pay for food by weight. Spread includes a variety of hot and cold dishes and is charged by weight. Each dish has a label with information on whether it is vegan, ovo, lacto and gluten free. Also offers fresh squeezed fruit juices. If you are in a hurry, perhaps grab a seitan-kebab from the counter and a house-made iced tea. Brunch on Sunday. Tibits buffet is all vegan on Tue.
